Adella Deming

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Lewis and Effie Luthy
  3. Location of Family: Aurora, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Aurora, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 11
  7. Date of Birth: 5/11/1906, NY
  8. Date of Death: 3/12/1999, Brunswick, GA
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Adella (Coffey) Jankovitz
  11. Spouse Name: Ross Coffey
  12. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Grand Island Independent (NE), 14 March 1999; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, Aurora Cemetery, Aurora, NE
